bibl.title: Toponymy of Fayyum Villages in the Ptolemaic Period.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Descriptive names, temples and gods. - Reuse of existing toponyms. - Alexandrian demes and Fayyum villages. - Villages named after private persons. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005

bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, Toponymy of Fayyum Villages in the Ptolemaic Period.

Mario CAPASSO and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005 (Galatina, 2007) pp. 67-81, 7 tabl., 1 graphique, 2 cartes coul.
[Introduction.] - Descriptive names, temples and gods. - Reuse of existing toponyms. - Alexandrian demes and Fayyum villages. - Villages named after private persons. - Conclusions.
